experience.title: Private Equity Investment Associate
experience.description: Emphasis was a Category II AIF (Social Venture Fund) with focus on Impact Investment Segments. •	Instrumental in setting up a Private Equity Fund focused on Bottom of The Pyramid segment         (Social Venture) investments. The sector includes Technology for development, BFSI ,         Agriculture based Startups, Renewable Energy, Healthcare and Sanitation, Information         Communication and Technology in rural areas, Education and Skilling.•	Prepared the Investment Memorandum for evaluating the current deal pipeline of the fund.

experience.title: Bank Loan Rating Associate
experience.description: •	Accountable for analyzing the credit risk profile of companies, tracking different industries and                   assessing impact of several policy changes on industries & corporate.•	Preparation of Financial Models with respect to Client industry and updating the existing        models with any specific updates to current industry practice.•	Accountable for the operations dealing with acquiring information relating to credit worthiness,       debt repayment abilities, overall business performance and forecasting financial performance       of companies. •      Hands on experience towards financial and business analysis of Indian companies in diverse       sectors leading to recommendation of Corporate and Bank loan Ratings.•     In charge for the activities correlated with reviewing and updating rating committee on rating      sensitivity factors on an ongoing basis.
experience.description_html: • Accountable for analyzing the credit risk profile of companies, tracking different industries and  assessing impact of several policy changes on industries & corporate.• Preparation of Financial Models with respect to Client industry and updating the existing models with any specific updates to current industry practice.• Accountable for the operations dealing with acquiring information relating to credit worthiness, debt repayment abilities, overall business performance and forecasting financial performance of companies. • Hands on experience towards financial and business analysis of Indian companies in diverse sectors leading to recommendation of Corporate and Bank loan Ratings.• In charge for the activities correlated with reviewing and updating rating committee on rating sensitivity factors on an ongoing basis.
